vote.title: Authorize (1) a three-year license agreement for use of the Cotton Bowl with a professional sports team Atlético Dallas dba USL with two one year renewal options; and (2) a three-year lease agreement for MoneyGram Soccer Park Complex with a professional sports team Atlético Dallas dba USL with two one year renewal options - Not to exceed $3,000,000.00 over three years - Financing: Convention Center Construction Fund (subject to annual appropriations); Estimated Minimum Revenue: Fair Park Special Maintenance Fund ($900,000.00) and Elm Fork Athletic Complex Fund ($300,000.00) over three years
vote.description: Authorize (1) a three-year license agreement for use of the Cotton Bowl with a professional sports team Atlético Dallas dba USL with two one year renewal options; and (2) a three-year lease agreement for MoneyGram Soccer Park Complex with a professional sports team Atlético Dallas dba USL with two one year renewal options - Not to exceed $3,000,000.00 over three years - Financing: Convention Center Construction Fund (subject to annual appropriations); Estimated Minimum Revenue: Fair Park Special Maintenance Fund ($900,000.00) and Elm Fork Athletic Complex Fund ($300,000.00) over three years
